item.title: My CVES
item.description: Here is a my selection of CVEs published: CVE-2024-33329: LumisXP - Unauthenticated XSS CVE-2024-33328: LumisXP - Unauthenticated XSS CVE-2024-33327: LumisXP - Unauthenticated XSS CVE-2024-33326: LumisXP - IDOR CVE-2023-26877: SeSuite - Code Execution CVE-2023-26876: Piwigo - SQL Injection CVE-2022-2863: WordPress WPvivid Backup - Path Traversal CVE-2021-46426: phpIPAM - CSRF + XSS CVE-2021-30140: LiquidFiles 3.4.15 - Stored XSS CVE-2020-35581: Envira Gallery Lite - Stored XSS CVE-2020-25790: Typesetter CMS - Code Execution CVE-2019-20803: Gila CMS 1.
